Posts.Content: Aug 18, 2017 06:43PM Bellkat wrote: I had the same issue on the left side, dr explained that sometimes when lymph nodes are involved, they do a lot of digging for the right ones. Up to three inches in my case, and they took all of the breast tissue which can expand further then expected. Hope this helps, good luck!
Posts.Title: Shoulder blade and under arm pain after mastectomy??? GreenEyes81 Rrobin0200

Posts.Content: Aug 27, 2017 10:59PM Bellkat wrote: Hi all... had surgery Aug 7th, had some breathing issues but otherwise all went as planned. The path came back completely negative!! But now they arent sure if I need radiation or not, guess they don't know with a TN?? Still having quite a bit of swelling/pain, even three weeks out, anybody else? I've been only taking tylenol and it doesn't seem to help.. any suggestions?
